response.overview: A film co-directed, produced, and edited by Ethan Wilson, alongside Jeff Hauck. The film is about a man who finds a mysterious golden doorknob that allows him to wish for anything, but at a cost.This film was a part of a Golden Doorknob film festival submission, in which a crew had to make a film that was 5 minutes long, where by the end someone has to die by a doorknob.
response.tagline: A man who finds a mysterious golden doorknob that allows him to wish for anything, but at a cost?
response.title: Eye For An Eye
